select.if: SELECT orderNo, userNo, reviewText, score, isDelete FROM Review WHERE orderNo = (SELECT orderNo FROM OrderDetail WHERE auctionNo = #{typeNo})
SELECT orderNo, userNo, reviewText, score, isDelete FROM Review WHERE orderNo = (SELECT orderNo FROM OrderDetail WHERE saleNo = #{typeNo})

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Review.orderNo) FROM Review WHERE userNo = #{userNo} AND isDelete = 0
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Review.orderNo) FROM Review where orderNo = (select userNo from ORDERDETAIL o, auction a where o.AUCTIONNO = a.AUCTIONNO AND a.userNo = #{userNo}) AND isDelete = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Review (orderNo, userNo, reviewText, score) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{userNo}, #{reviewText}, #{score})
